name: The Lushes Land
summary: Explore The Lushes Land and uncover its mysteries in this Action-Adventure spin-off of Tochi! On your adventure, you'll be tasked with finding the lost gems of The Lushes Land! While you're exploring, you'll encounter some of the inhabitants. Most are friendly, others not so much, so be wary while exploring and make sure you don't get lost in the wilderness!
